mapper.select: select directorate_name commandName, data_source dataSource from ads_cdemerg_yjzhb group by directorate_name,data_source

select ifnull(working_team_name,'') label, ifnull(lead_unit,'') leadUnit, ifnull(member_unit,'') memberUnit, ifnull(responsibility,'') content, ifnull(data_source,'') dataSource from ads_cdemerg_yjzhb where 1=1 and directorate_name = #{commandName} order by CAST(ph AS DECIMAL)
